instruction: Transform the passage into a conversation between two characters.
input: John had a bad day at work and was feeling down.
output:
John: Man, I had such an awful day at work today. I feel so down.
Jane: Oh, no! What happened?
John: Nothing went the way I wanted it to. I just didn't have any luck.
Jane: Well, what can I do to help? Is there anything I can do for you?
John: No, I think I just need a break from it all. I'll be alright. Thanks for asking.
